org.sensorhub.impl.module

Class AbstractModule<ConfigType extends ModuleConfig>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.module.AbstractModule<ConfigType>
  • Type Parameters:
    ConfigType -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventProducer, IModule<ConfigType>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSensorModule, HttpServer, InMemoryBasicStorage, InMemorySensorStorage, SensorStorageHelper

    public abstract class AbstractModule<ConfigType extends ModuleConfig>
extends Object
implements IModule<ConfigType>

    Class providing default implementation of common module API methods
